analyzed: dpal byas dkyil du gzugs/_/de yi mtha' ma 'theb skyus dgang /_/ra khyi

analyzed: phag gsum rog po yi/_/sha dang khrag gis brgyan pa ste/_/chus sbyangs bsham
translated: adorned with the flesh and blood of the three black animals,🔽the dog, the pig, and the crow,🔽washed with water,🔽arranged in a skull-cup.

original: snod thod pa'o/_/bar du gcod pa'i bgegs rnams kun/_/lag pa g.yon pas se
analyzed: snod thod pa'o/_/bar du gcod pa'i bgegs rnams kun/_/lag pa g.yon pas se

original: gol rtog cing sngags bzlas la/_/rang rang gnas su bskrad par bya/_/gtor🔽ma gtor snod bcas pa rnams/_/dag pa'i swa b+ha ba'i sngags brjod stong par bya/_/

translated: Having recited the svabhāva mantra, the torma and the vessel should be emptied.

original: khro bo reg tshhig gi gtor chog
analyzed: khro bo reg tshhig gi gtor chog
translated: The Torma Ritual of the Wrathful One, the Touch

original: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin las/_/rni las mi dang 'dra ba ru gyad gsum sgyed pu ste/_/
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin las/_/rni las mi dang 'dra ba ru gyad gsum sgyed pu ste/_/
translated: From the nature of emptiness, from ni comes a human corpse, the three humps of a camel.🔽From e comes a precious skull-cup vessel, white outside and red inside, facing forward.

original: e las rin chen thod pa'i snod phyi dkar la nang dmar ba mdun rang la bstan pa/_/dbus su yo
analyzed: e las rin chen thod pa'i snod phyi dkar la nang dmar ba mdun rang la bstan pa/_/dbus su yo
translated: In the center, from yo, is a human liver.🔽To the right, from su, is a human heart. To the left, from ka, is a human head.🔽In the back, from haṃ, is a human brain. To the left, from a, is a human kidney.🔽In the front, from oṃ, is a human eye.

original: g.yas su su sngon du lo rgyab tu kham g.yon du am las ni/_/phrag dog mkhris pa 'dod chags khrag dang nga
analyzed: g.yas su su sngon du lo rgyab tu kham g.yon du am las ni/_/phrag dog mkhris pa 'dod chags khrag dang nga
translated: In the back, from āḥ, is a human tongue.🔽In the center, from hūṃ, is a human thigh bone.🔽In the front, from oṃ, is a human skull.🔽In the back, from āḥ, is a human skin.🔽In the center, from hūṃ, is a human skeleton.🔽In the front, from oṃ, is a human heart.🔽In the back, from āḥ, is a human tongue.🔽In the center, from hūṃ, is a human thigh bone.🔽In the front, from oṃ, is a human skull.🔽In the back, from āḥ, is a human skin.🔽In the center, from hūṃ, is a human skeleton.🔽In the front, from oṃ, is a human heart.🔽In the back, from āḥ, is a human tongue.🔽In the center, from hūṃ, is a human thigh bone.🔽In the front, from oṃ, is a human skull.

original: rgyal glad pa gti mug sha_/zhe sdang rus pa la sogs dug lnga bsam/_/yi ge 'bru o ah hum
analyzed: rgyal glad pa gti mug sha_/zhe sdang rus pa la sogs dug lnga bsam/_/yi ge 'bru o ah hum
translated: In the back, from āḥ, is a human skin.🔽In the center, from hūṃ, is a human skeleton.

original: gsum steng bsams la/_/zhu nas dngos po thim pa'i bdud rtshir gyur/_/snying kha nas
analyzed: gsum steng bsams la/_/zhu nas dngos po thim pa'i bdud rtshir gyur/_/snying kha nas
translated: In the front, from oṃ, is a human heart.🔽In the back, from āḥ, is a human tongue.🔽In the center, from hūṃ, is a human thigh bone.🔽In the front, from oṃ, is a human skull.🔽In the back, from āḥ, is a human skin.🔽In the center, from hūṃ, is a human skeleton.🔽In the

analyzed: lcags kyu 'dra ba'i 'od 'phros pas/_/dgra bgegs kyi snying phug a glu shas kug ste/_/ gtor ma la gnyis su med par bstim par bya/_/'od 'phros lha dgu pho nya
translated: Light rays like hooks radiate and draw out the life force of the enemies and obstructors.🔽Dissolve them inseparably into the torma.🔽Light radiates and invites the nine deities and their messengers in front.

original: dang /_/bcas par mdun du spyan drangs la/_/sngags 'di brjod la dbul
analyzed: dang /_/bcas par mdun du spyan drangs la/_/sngags 'di brjod la dbul

original: la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na/_/khro rgyal
analyzed: la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na/_/khro rgyal
translated: Homage! In the midst of the blazing mass of the fire of the eon, the eight🔽victorious wrathful ones stand in the dance posture.

original: brgyad po stang stabs tshhul du bzhugs/_/zhal du dgra bgegs don snying ma lus
analyzed: brgyad po stang stabs tshhul du bzhugs/_/zhal du dgra bgegs don snying ma lus
